A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Five star for the first two thirds\, metaphorically fist pumping and thinking best Star Wars movie ever. And then post-Snoke (about where it should have ended) it dies a horrible prolonged train wreck of a movie death. Tore my fandom heart out watching it. I suspect a production disagreement over where this franchise was going in the future made for an overly long muddled confused inconsistent meander to the credits.
